Title: Silverlight Adorner Control
Description:
An Adorner is a custom FrameworkElement that is bound to a FrameworkElement and displays information about that element 'above' the element without disturbing layout.

Common applications for adorners include:
 * Adding handles
 * Providing visual feedback
 * Adding decorations
